definition: Alxa League, a prefecture-level subdivision of Inner Mongolia/abbr. for 阿拉善盟[A1 la1 shan4 Meng2]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: The Arab League hopes that the U.N. Security Council will play an even greater role on the Middle East issue.
sentences.chinese: 阿盟希望聯合國安理會在中東問題上發揮更大作用。

sentences.english: But members of the league could also have less altruistic motives.
sentences.chinese: 但是，阿盟各成員國的動機也談不上大公無私。

definition: African Union (AU), abbr. for 非洲聯盟|非洲联盟
Arab League, regional organization of Arab states in Southwest Asia, and North and Northeast Africa, officially called the League of Arab States

definition: Erdogan (name)/Recep Tayyip Erdoğan (1954-), Turkish politician, prime minister from 2003
